檏檏檏

檏字的基本解释

檏
pǔ
古同“朴”。

檏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pǔ］
［《廣韻》匹角切，入覺，滂。］
亦作“檏1”。“朴7”的繁体字。
(1)未经加工成器的木材。
(2)砍伐整理。
(3)根。
(4)货物的成本。
(5)本质；本性。
(6)朴实；厚重。
[②]［pú］
［《廣韻》蒲木切，入屋，並。］
［《廣韻》博木切，入屋，幫。］
亦作“檏2”。“朴8”的繁体字。
(1)丛生的树木。
(2)指柞木。参见“樸2桷”。
(3)附着，依附。
[③]［pú］
［《廣韻》薄胡切，平模，並。］
亦作“檏3”。“朴9”的繁体字。
古地名用字。汉置樸县。在今甘肃省古浪县东。

檏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檏； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第26
同樸。又陽樸，地名，在蜀郡。【呂覽·本味篇】和之美者，陽樸之薑，招搖之桂。

檏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
檏字的起名意思

暂无。

Pu
Basic explanation of words
Pu
pǔ
Ancient Tong "Plain".
Pu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pǔ]
["Guangyun" the corner of the horse is cut, enters the senses, and feels awkward. ]
Also known as "檏1". Traditional characters of "朴7".
(1) Wood that has not been processed into utensils.
(2) Felling and finishing.
(3) Root.
(4) The cost of goods.
(5) Essence; nature.
(6) Simple; heavy.
[②]［pú］
["Guangyun" Pu Mu cut, enter the house, and merge. ]
["Guangyun" Bo Muqie, enter the house, help. ]
Also known as "檏2". Traditional characters of "朴8".
(1) Clusters of trees.
(2) Refers to oak wood. See "Park 2 Jue".
(3) Attachment, attachment.
[③] [pú]
["Guang Yun" thin Hu cut, flat mold, and. ]
Also known as "檏3". Traditional characters of "朴9".
Ancient place names use words. The Han Dynasty was home to Puxian County. In the east of present-day Gulang County, Gansu Province.
Pu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檏; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 26
Tongpu. Youyangpu, the place name, is in Shu County. 【Lv Lan·Ben Taste Article】The beauty of harmony, the ginger of yang pu, the laurel of swagger.
Pu

Pu
Name meaning
Nothing.
